data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Gamba to take a throw-in in Sendai territory.
In the minute 1, Takumi Sasaki of Sendai smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Minoru Tojo awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Sendai in their own half.
In the minute 3, Sendai's Takumi Sasaki is on target but unsuccessful.
Sendai takes a corner from the right.
Minoru Tojo signals a throw-in for Sendai, close to Gamba's area.
In the minute 4, Throw-in Gamba.
Sendai drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Gamba are whistled for offside.
In the minute 6, Sendai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Gamba in the half of Sendai.
Minoru Tojo has awarded Gamba a corner.
In the minute 7, Shinya Yajima of Gamba gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Sendai at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Sendai are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 9, Gamba have a dangerous throw-in.
Shoji Toyama's header is off-target for Gamba.
Sendai have a goal kick.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Gamba at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Can Gamba capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sendai's half?
Gamba push forward at Panasonic Stadium Suita and Kazuma Watanabe gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sendai defence.
In the minute 13, Gamba have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
Minoru Tojo signals a Sendai throw-in in Gamba's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 16, Throw-in high up the field for Sendai in Suita.
Minoru Tojo awards Gamba a goal kick.
Shun Nagasawa is on target to give Sendai a 0-1 advantage.
In the minute 17, Great play from Isaac Cuenca to set up the goal.
Gamba pushes forward through Shinya Yajima, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Gamba.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Sendai in their own half.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
Sendai awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 22, Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Sendai.
Gamba have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
In the minute 28, Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
Ball safe as Gamba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sendai's half?
In the minute 31, Sendai advance rapidly upfield but Minoru Tojo blows for offside.
In Suita Sendai attack through Ryutaro Iio. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Suita.
In the minute 36, Ball safe as Sendai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Sendai in the half of Gamba.
Throw-in Gamba.
In the minute 37, Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Gamba.
Free kick Gamba.
In Suita a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 41, Sendai are pushing forward but Para's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
Can Sendai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gamba's half?
In the minute 42, Sendai to take a throw-in in Gamba territory.
Corner awarded to Sendai.
Sendai have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
In the minute 44, Goal! Shun Nagasawa extends Sendai lead to 0-2 with a header.
Takuma Hamasaki with an assist there.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Suita.
Sendaiâ€™s Keiya Shiihashi is on his feet again at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
In the minute 45, Sendai needs to be cautious. Gamba have an attacking throw-in.
Minoru Tojo signals a Gamba throw-in in Sendai's half.
Shoji Toyama (Gamba) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 45, Minoru Tojo awards Sendai a goal kick.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Keiya Shiihashi is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Minoru Tojo has blown to start the second-half.
Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sendai's half?
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Gamba in the half of Sendai.
In the minute 46, Patric is replacing Shoji Toyama for the home team.
Tsuneyasu Miyamoto is making the team's second substitution at Panasonic Stadium Suita with Kosuke Onose replacing Shinya Yajima.
Gamba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sendai's Hiroto Yamada gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 47, Gamba have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Minoru Tojo awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 49, Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
Gamba's Patric has run offside.
Throw-in for Gamba at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
In the minute 52, Minoru Tojo signals a Sendai throw-in in Gamba's half.
Throw-in for Gamba in their own half.
Gamba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 53, Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
Goal kick for Sendai at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Corner awarded to Sendai.
In the minute 55, Sendai have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
Gamba to take a throw-in in Sendai territory.
Corner awarded to Gamba.
In the minute 57, Minoru Tojo awards the away team a throw-in.
Sendai awarded a free kick in their own half.
Takahiro Yanagi is replacing Para for Sendai at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
In the minute 62, At Panasonic Stadium Suita, Gamba are penalized for being offside.
Throw-in for Gamba in their own half.
Throw-in for Sendai at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Sendai in the half of Gamba.
Ball safe as Gamba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 66, Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Sendai!
Gamba's Gen Shoji has been booked in Suita.
In the minute 70, Important block from the Gamba defence as Takuma Hamasaki fires in a strike for Sendai.
Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
Tsuneyasu Miyamoto (Gamba) is making a third substitution, with Yuya Fukuda replacing Hiroki Fujiharu.
In the minute 71, Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sendai's half?
It's a goal kick for the away team in Suita.
Sendai to take a throw-in in Gamba territory.
Can Sendai capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 73, Gamba make their fourth substitution with Shuhei Kawasaki replacing Yuki Yamamoto.
Ryutaro Iio hits the bar with a header! Very nearly a goal there for Sendai in Suita.
In the minute 74, Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sendai move into a more comfortable 0-3 lead. Shun Nagasawa is the scorer with a header!
That's a fine assist from Takumi Sasaki.
In the minute 77, Minoru Tojo signals a Sendai throw-in in Gamba's half.
Throw-in Gamba.
Minoru Tojo signals a Gamba throw-in in Sendai's half.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Gamba in the half of Sendai.
Gamba are caught offside.
Minoru Tojo awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 80, Gamba to take a throw-in in Sendai territory.
Gamba have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sendai's half?
In the minute 83, Sendai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The away team have replaced Isaac Cuenca with Takayoshi Ishihara. This is the second substitution made today by Takashi Kiyama.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 85, Goal kick for Sendai at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Throw-in Sendai.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
In the minute 89, Goal! Takahiro Yanagi extends Sendai's lead to 0-4.
The away team replace Takuma Hamasaki with Shogo Nakahara.
Simao is on a sub for Takumi Sasaki for Sendai.
Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Sendai in the half of Gamba.
Throw-in for Gamba in their own half.
Sendai are in shooting range from this free kick.
Throw-in for Sendai close to the penalty box.
Gamba needs to be cautious. Sendai have an attacking throw-in.
Minoru Tojo blows to end the match. The final score is 0-4.
Ren Shibamoto is on a sub for Kohei Okuno for Gamba.
